H0.text: What cocktail is made with advocaat and lemonade. Snowball

H1.text: What cocktail is made with advocaat and lemonade. Fluffy Duck

H2.text: What cocktail is made with advocaat and lemonade. Advocaat Spritzer

H3.text: What cocktail is made with advocaat and lemonade. Iceball

A4.text: A snowball is a cocktail containing advocaat and carbonated lemonade in approximately equal parts.
